ygData.subject: Re: My thought on how the guy got the book...
ygData.msgSnippet: Ohh Please, don t start spreading this bs.  I know the guy personally, he s not part of some secret EQ emu society , you guy s are so quick to believe anything
ygData.messageBody:
Ohh Please, don't start spreading this bs. I know the guy personally, he's
not part of some secret EQ emu society , you guy's are so quick to believe
anything that someone says.

The reason why he hasn't released the info on the book is becuase he takes
pride in being the only person who has found it. He doesn't want this to
get ruined like every other damn secret in eq. Yes, the book is IN GAME.
It's in steamfront, somewhere. When I talked to him, he said that is was a
freak accident how he found it.

-Keeganex Gemchopper
Gnome Warrior
Cazic-Thule

----- Original Message -----
From: David <imgsrc@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, October 20, 1999 6:41 PM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] My thought on how the guy got the book...


> From: David <imgsrc@...>
>
> Now I'm not saying anyone is a cheater but... If you have all these people
> looking for the book and it can't be found its most likely not in the game
yet.
>
> As you may of heard people have been working on an eq emu.
> And as you may have known there is a command to summon items, each item
has
> a number. some people where summoning items starting from 0001 or
soemthing
> and working their way up. Baiscly I think that someone was summoning items
> and ran across the book. And blam history is made.
>
> It would explaine why the person hasn't said where the book its and/or how
> to get it.
> -Dave
>
>
